page.title: 32LIFE STYLES IN THE COUNTRY
page.content: In many families both parents work either locally or commute to larger cities. Many do not have families living close by and, therefore, child care is quite a big issue. Traditional country pursuits, whilst still popular with some, do not feature in the life of many in the village. There is a local hunt and clay pigeon shooting in the area. Horse riding is very popular and quite a few own their own horses. Rough shooting and especially fishing are popular. There is a thriving allotment community in the village and there is always a waiting list for vacant plots. There are musical events in the village and around the area which are quite well attended.
